Nashua.St. Aloysius of Gonzaga Church: Saint Aloysius de Gonzaga, S.J. (Italian: Aluigi de Gonzaga; March 9, 1568 – June 21, 1591) was an Italian aristocrat who became a member of the Society of Jesus. While still a student at the Roman College, he died as a result of caring for the victims of a serious epidemic. He was beatified in 1605 and canonized in 1726.
